participant_1.background:
There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.
My parents are very supportive of my decision to take a break from work to focus on my family.
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
i like field hockey and soccer.
i went on welfare last month , which makes me want to run into traffic in front of big trucks.

participant_2.background:
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
i love the game halo.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy playing Halo and dressing up as my favorite comic book characters.
I have never played Halo. Is it fun?
It is a really fun game. It is a first person shooter and you play as Master Chief.
I am not good at first person shooters. I like playing sports.
Do you play soccer or field hockey?
I play both soccer and field hockey. I am not very good at either one.
That is okay. I am not very good at either one either. I just like to play them.
I am glad that we have something in common.
Me too. I am glad that we are talking.
Me too. I have enjoyed talking to you.
I have enjoyed talking to you too.
